item.title: CIS CIS CSAT Pro
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://cisecurity.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/15/article/2434301961 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Vulnerable NCSC-NL Upgrade to v1.7.1.
